channel.title: Refresh Renovation Articles
channel.description: Stay up to date on our local and international renovation news.

item.title: What does a Full Home Remodel Process look like in League City? | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: A lot goes on behind the scenes of a full home renovation. From picking out materials to applying for Houston permits, we want to help make the process of remodeling a home as simple and stress-free as possible. Read on to learn the basics of planning a home remodeling project and the essential elements to consider.

item.title: From Dream to Reality: Key Steps in a Home Remodeling Project in The Woodlands, Texas | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: With so much going on during a full home remodel, it’s easy to get overwhelmed with details. To make sure you don’t miss any key steps, we’ve covered some essentials here, such as timeline expectations, permits, design, and working with a project manager.

item.title: Maximizing Home Value: The Impact of Kitchen Remodeling in The Woodlands, Texas | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: When looking to freshen up your kitchen, you don’t always need to remodel the entire thing at once. Small changes can be impactful and typically more affordable, but there are pros and cons.

item.title: Remodeling a Kitchen: What's the Best Order for Renovations? | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: Are you motivated by increasing your property’s value in advance of selling your home down the line? Or do you want to create a completely custom kitchen that you’ll love to use for years to come? Determining the purpose of your renovation will help you make better decisions down the road.

item.title: How to Plan a Successful Kitchen Remodel in League City | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: Executing a successful kitchen remodel takes a significant amount of planning, but we’ve narrowed it down to a few important tasks: your kitchen’s potential, realistic budgeting, experienced contractors, and great design! Read on for details.

item.title: How Much Would It Cost To Finish My Colorado Basement | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: The short answer? Basement remodeling costs in Boulder could run you anywhere from $45,000* to upwards of $150,000*.

item.title: Simple, High Value Strategies for Your Kitchen Remodel | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: We talked to local Sugar Land Remodeling Consultant, Kevin Revere, to learn which aspects of a kitchen remodel provide the most value.

item.title: How Garage Conversions Can Help You Avoid Relocating in League City | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: Renovate or relocate? Homeowners are constantly debating this issue. But over the past few years, this question has become increasingly hard to answer. With the volatile housing market and rising interest rates, it’s not always realistic, let alone wise, to sell your house.

item.title: How Much Does a Kitchen Remodel Cost In The Woodlands | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: Wondering how much it’ll cost to remodel your kitchen in The Woodlands, TX? You’re not alone! Check out this article to learn more.

item.title: Basement Conversions: How to turn a basement into a living space | Inspiration & Advice
item.description: Thanks to our chilly climate, most homes in Boulder have basements. Their primary purpose is to provide a stable foundation, but whether a basement is finished or not is a different story.

item.title: House Extensions on the Rise in Surrey | Surrey builders | News & Events
item.description: Estate agents are reporting that in the last 12 months stock availability slowed, with fewer properties coming on to the market, while house prices rose less quickly, due in no small part to the ongoing Brexit negotiations. Overall, it appears that recent house price rises are attributable more to a shortage in supply than an upturn in buyer demand.
